TEXAS EDUCATION AGENC
(HyAy U —a4^-
AUSTIN, TEXAS
• STATE BOARD OF EDUCATION
• STATE COMMISSIONER OF EDUCATION
• STATE DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION
February 28, 1957
Dr. Harold E. Hill
Associate Director
National Association of
Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
119 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Dr. Hills
Since our television project in Austin, Texas is now operating in its
seventh month of the first year, we have not had an opportunity as yet
to accumulate information that will indicate specific outcomes of the
program. The general background information I sent to you several
weeks ago is really all that we have at this time.
We do plan to employ through contract a research group to study and
to evaluate the project during the second year of its operation which
will begin June 1, 1957*
We are very glad that you are interested in this information and we
do want to make it available to you as soon as it is completed.
Sincerely yours,
Lee Wilborn
Assistant Commissioner
for Instruction
